thread.title: Initial Hygiene IE reviewed by Mary
thread.title_full: Initial Hygiene IE reviewed by Mary

author: Mary
title: Initial Hygiene IE reviewed by Mary
text: I had a malodour problem in the restaurant's washoom, so I contacted Initial for solution. The Air freshener is cost-effective and it did help me solve the problem. The staff is professional and friendly. I would recommend Initial to anyone.
